text: Takkha hiwa inni hi in-ang ripmu, ajarchu Pathian manboi kutchoi chu Adam manu ka-ang emak. Akadik kha eii, miring inkhat manu jarra miring angjet thina innei. Takkha Pathian riangwai hichu kalokdoom kha eii, halli Jisu Christa bit-in amankaboi Pathian riangwai kutchoi kha mi angjet diang apeii.
